To facilitate the process, they developed and patented an automatic cataloging and digitization technology for clothes, based on Artificial Intelligence. Their digital marketplace matches the B2B supply and demand of used clothes, as well as an Artificial Intelligence technology that extracts the useful data for the circular process from the picture of each garment, channelling it to the most efficient way to reuse it.
